### I. SWORN AFFIDAVIT OF ENABLEMENT
I, Donald Paul Smith, provide this disclosure as a formal "Reduction to Practice" of the following technologies:
1. **The 0.003 Upwards Drift Solution:** Mathematical correction for LEO/Lunar navigation.
2. **SC1 Hardware:** Regenerative magnetic shelf motor with kinetic harvesting.
3. **QCC Synchronization:** Real-time entanglement stability at 0.42ns.
